name: Tanisha Katara
description:
Tanisha plays a dual role. As an independent consultant, she has worked with 6+ clients in the last 1.5 years. She has a diverse client base, from DAO tooling applications to Protocols and Data Availability to Governments.

As the Governance Innovation Specialist at Polygon Technology, she helps design decentralized and secure governance systems by engaging in projects such as the governance hub, defining the parameters for system smart contracts governance, validator admission & reputation.
